# Results
```{r}
Covid19_selected_df$Month <- format(as.Date(Covid19_selected_df$date), "%m")
Covid19_selected_df$Day <- format(as.Date(Covid19_selected_df$date), "%d")
```
```{r}
data <- Covid19_selected_df %>% select(Month, total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid, total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid)
```
```{r}
newdata <- na.omit(data)
```
```{r}
data <- newdata %>% arrange(Month, total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid, total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid) %>% group_by(Month) %>% summarise(across(everything(), last))
```
```{r}
tidydata <- data %>% pivot_longer(cols = !Month, names_to = "stat", values_to = "number")
tidydata
```
```{r}
ggplot(tidydata, aes(fill=stat, y=number, x=Month)) + 
    geom_bar(position="fill", stat="identity")
```
